title: Force HTTPS
body:
To force HTTPS on your v2 website you have to have a valid SSL certificate.
To check if your ssl certificate is valid you can go to https://yoursite.com and check if it says "Secure Connection" when clicking on the lock in the url bar.

If you get an error after enabling force HTTPS you can disable it by deleting `cache/033f3da34ae9ec9661072ab0897ddf7ed642de3f.cache` file.
